#include<vector>
#include<string>
#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
#include <fstream>
#include<iomanip>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstdio>
#include<stack>
#include<cstring>
#include<map>
#include<set>
#include<queue>  
using namespace std;
#define MOD 100000007
long long a[55];
long long b[22]={1,2,3,5,13,89,233,1597,28657,514229,433494437};
int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
	int i;
	a[1]=2;
	a[2]=3;
	for(i=3;i<=50;i++)
	{
		a[i]=a[i-2]+a[i-1];
		//cout<<i+2<<' '<<a[i]<<endl;
	}
	cin>>i;
	cout<<b[i]<<endl;
	//system("pause");
	return 0;
}
